text: Jewel Areng () is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the incumbent Member of Parliament from Mymensingh-1. He is the youngest member of parliament and the only Catholic. His father, Promode Mankin, was the State Minister for Social Welfare in the Bangladesh Awami League government. ==Career== On 18 July 2016 Areng was elected to Parliament from Mymensingh-1 in a special election. The special election was held after the seat became vacant after the death of Promode Mankin, the Member of Parliament and father of Jewel Areng. Areng beat his opponent, Selina Khatun, by 155,866 votes. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Bangladeshi Christians Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jewel Areng
